smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function fetchHistoricalData appears to be too complex.
The function handle appears to be too complex.
The function saveAlert appears to be too complex.
The function asLabelString appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function fetchHistoricalData is nested too deeply.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'NewPriceAlertViewModel' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SparkView' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'PriceAlertRepositoryImpl' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'BRSharedPrefs' with '99' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'BRDFirebaseMessagingService' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'Companion' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class BRSharedPrefs is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000
Parentheses in (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000

Parentheses in (System.currentTimeMillis() - it.timeStamp * DateUtils.SECOND_IN_MILLIS) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: System.currentTimeMillis() - it.timeStamp * DateUtils.SECOND_IN_MILLIS
Parentheses in (state == NotificationsState.APP_ENABLED && !enable) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: state == NotificationsState.APP_ENABLED && !enable
Parentheses in (state == NotificationsState.APP_DISABLED && enable) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: state == NotificationsState.APP_DISABLED && enable
Parentheses in (minX * xScale) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: minX * xScale
Parentheses in (lineWidthOffset / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: lineWidthOffset / 2
Parentheses in (lineWidthOffset / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: lineWidthOffset / 2
Parentheses in (rawY * yScale) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: rawY * yScale

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: org.junit.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.mockito.Mockito.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.breadwallet.ui.util.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.arch.lifecycle.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.breadwallet.tools.mvvm.Status.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
androidx.work.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.
